sentences.en: All dogs are capable of doing harm to human beings.
sentences.cn: 只要是狗就可能会咬人。

sentences.en: Cells divide and renew as part of the human growth process.
sentences.cn: 细胞不断地分裂更新，这是人体发育过程的一部分。

sentences.en: Depression lowers the human ability to cope with disease.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症会降低人体对疾病的抵抗力。

sentences.en: different areas of human experience
sentences.cn: 人类各方面的经验

sentences.en: He pulls a rickshaw, probably the oldest form of human taxi service.
sentences.cn: 他拉黄包车，这可能是人类最古老的载客服务形式了。

sentences.en: He was concerned with the enhancement of the human condition.
sentences.cn: 他关心人类生存环境的改善。

sentences.en: In the treaty both sides pledge to respect human rights.
sentences.cn: 双方在条约中都承诺将尊重人权。

sentences.en: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye .
sentences.cn: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.en: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye.
sentences.cn: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.en: It was yet another case where the human eye outperformed radar.
sentences.cn: 这是肉眼胜过雷达的又一事例。

sentences.en: Language is not art but both are forms of human behavior.
sentences.cn: 言语不是艺术，但两者都是人类的行为方式。

sentences.en: Like humans, cats and dogs are omnivores.
sentences.cn: 和人类一样，猫和狗是杂食性动物。

sentences.en: Most of the wine was unfit for human consumption.
sentences.cn: 这些酒中大部分都不适于人类饮用。

sentences.en: respect for the absolute value of human life
sentences.cn: 对人类生命绝对价值的尊重

sentences.en: She was caustically brilliant, yet totally loyal, unpretentious, human and tolerant.
sentences.cn: 她这个人才气逼人，可是绝对忠诚可靠，而且毫不做作，有人情味和宽容心。

sentences.en: The accident was the result of human error .
sentences.cn: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.en: The accident was the result of human error.
sentences.cn: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.en: The desire for joy lies deep within the human spirit .
sentences.cn: 对快乐的渴求藏在人类心灵深处。

sentences.en: The human population swelled, at least temporarily, as migrants moved south.
sentences.cn: 随着移居者南移，人口出现膨胀，至少是暂时性膨胀。

sentences.en: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption .
sentences.cn: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.en: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.cn: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.en: the power of the human mind
sentences.cn: 人脑的威力

sentences.en: theories of human behaviour
sentences.cn: 关于人类行为的理论

sentences.en: There are many different cell types in the human body .
sentences.cn: 人体中有许多种不同的细胞类型。

sentences.en: They have the usual quota of human weaknesses, no doubt.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他们身上也有人所共有的弱点。

sentences.en: This basic utilitarian model gives a relatively unsophisticated account of human behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这个实用的基础模型较为简略地解释了人类的行为。

sentences.en: This Human Rights Act is enforceable in the ordinary courts.
sentences.cn: 这项《人权法案》适用于普通法庭。

sentences.en: Twelve potential vaccines are currently being tested on human volunteers.
sentences.cn: 目前正在人类志愿者身上试验12种试用疫苗。

words.tran_cn: 人文主义的；人道主义的
人文主义的；人道主义的
以人力；像人地；在人力所能及的范围
变得有人性；变得仁慈；有教化力（等于humanize）
人道主义者；人类学者，人文学者；人文主义者
人类；人道；仁慈；人文学科
教化；赋予人性；使通人情

phrases.tran_cn: 人力资源管理；人力调配

trans.tran_cn: 人的，人本性的，通人情的
trans.tran_en: belonging to or relating to people, especially as opposed to machines or animals
